page.title: 03Changes in Whitminster.
page.content:
The following are impressions gained from local residents about the way the village has altered over the past few years.
"The village has grown dramatically in the last ten years, although School Lane has not changed much since the war. Three ponds in the village have been filled in. One was on Manor Farm yard and is now a building site".
"Five or six lime trees were removed from the main street and we think it would be nice to replant some".
As a part of this survey we interviewed one local resident who gave us some detailed memories of the village. Continued on next page.
